text: Avarkal tamakkut tame aniyayam ceypavarkalaka irukkum nilaiyil, malakkukal avarkalutaiya uyirkalaik kaipparruvarkal; appotu avarkal, "nankal entavitamana timaiyum ceyyavillaiye!" Enru (kilpatintavarkalaka malakkukalitam) camatanam koruvarkal; "avvarillai! Niccayamaka allah ninkal ceytu kontiruntavarrai nankarintavan; (enru malakkukal patilalipparkal)
